tweets.text: I have two exciting opportunities to join my Executive Leadership Team and be at the heart of leading @EnvAgency in creating a better place for people and wildlife. Chief Operating Officer: https://t.co/O14DgMmEkw and Executive Director of Local Operations https://t.co/EzQWNw1xLa

@greenbeltsal @EnvAgencyYNE @floodmary As always, happy to meet (virtually)  & discuss these items & share how @UniOfHull @_aurainnovation can help drive a new low carbon economy. But you have never responded to my offers of my time to meet me, preferring to randomly reply to the odd tweet here & there? https://t.co/dVU4wzNf29

The flood embankment in St Peter's Fields is almost complete as part of York flood defences.

We now need to close the footpath intermittently between 26 Oct -18 December to raise the flood defences on Almery Terrace & fit with flood-resistant glass panels.

#flooding #york https://t.co/wniec1wkN5

You can now use an online map to see exactly where our ground investigations & river channel works are taking place in Hebden Bridge to help develop flood defences to better protect the community. 

For more info  https://t.co/Y2tdmiVOaF @BAMNuttall 

#flooding #HebdenbridgeFAS https://t.co/FqWnGzQMjh

Update: Public consultation on Tadcaster Flood Alleviation Scheme extended to 25 October.
Have your say on our virtual interactive site: https://t.co/tFnbzBCpuY
Newsletters are being delivered to homes and businesses. https://t.co/79XNp3q5R5

Here's some time lapse footage of work we've completed in #Doncaster to repair damage to the #flood bank caused by last year's floods. This project will ensure the local community in better protected from the risk of #flooding this winter #WinterReady @BAMNuttall @ArupGroup https://t.co/7FUfXSFh7x

We've completed repairs to a 40 metre slip on a flood defence embankment in #Doncaster, as part of our work to repair and improve defences for winter #WinterReady https://t.co/GshNxaUXBI https://t.co/X3VEGmmHnN

As a precaution, we‚Äôve closed the penstock on the River Leven at Stokesley, which diverts water away from the town into a diversion channel. 

It follows heavy rainfall throughout the day. Our incident team will continue to monitor the #rainfall  across the region overnight. https://t.co/HnWjZGJMXr
@MariaHerlihyEA @EnvAgencySE @MarkHill03 @wifo_ea @sarahchareEA @TobyWillisonEA Also heavy overgrowth in the Old Windsor lock cut impeding safe navigation https://t.co/327Uwur5sH

Enforcement patrols out yesterday engaging with River users between #Wallingford Town. Moorings to #Benson Lock 22 vessels checked ,11 booked unregistered and 8 no name issued .#TeamEA .@EnvAgencySE @MarkHill03 @wifo_ea @Ang_WaterwaysEA
@_SandraWindsor @EnvAgencySE @MarkHill03 @wifo_ea @sarahchareEA @TobyWillisonEA We will look into and address

Keynote speaker @EmmaHowardBoyd of @EnvAgency says treating mitigation and adaptation as two sides of the same coin is 'key to the success of the green recovery from Covid-19 and also the UK‚Äôs ability to inspire a game-changing international agreement at COP26.' #UKClimateAdapt

tweets.text: @Robert58585858 @EnvAgencyMids They are not lock gates as such but work on similar principle. Water pressure from high levels on the River Derwent forces them shut then the Bentley Brook is over pumped back into the river.

@MariaHerlihyEA @EnvAgencySE @MarkHill03 @wifo_ea @sarahchareEA @TobyWillisonEA Are you aware of the obstructions in the channels under the bridge at Cookham/Bourne end?  It would be most helpful if they can be cleared please https://t.co/xs9CQZbX69
@EnvAgencyMids @PaulReevesEA Something distinctly dodgy with that there lock. üòÇüòÇ
Love a leaky woody dam in action! #slowtheflow #naturalfloodmanagement #leakywoodydam #nfm #flooding @worcscc @TewkesburyBCgov @isbournecatch @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK https://t.co/2eJqVp33qE

We‚Äôve contributed to a project led by @EnvAgencyNW & @EdenRiversTrust which allows wildlife üêü to flourish AND protects the WCML in #Penrith from flooding, keeping important #freight & @TPEassist & @AvantiWestCoast trains üöû on the move.

WATCH our video: https://t.co/uHBmJ7L3SB https://t.co/XxfmcLYApt
How it started  V How it‚Äôs going https://t.co/vNGRIrR8mm

Unblocktober is the world‚Äôs first month-long national campaign and awareness month to improve the health of our drains, sewers, watercourses and seas. 

@unblocktober @YorkshireWater @RiverCalder 

To find out how you can help visit: https://t.co/QwDQNgy7Lf

#unblocktober https://t.co/hdqhSlW2cY

‚ÄòIs the UK on track to adapt to climate change‚Äô conference opens 10am with welcome & aims from @rowan_sutton of @AtmosScience @sdessai of @UKCRP_SPF & @KathrynABrown of @theCCCuk, followed by keynote by @EmmaHowardBoyd of @EnvAgency. https://t.co/jcrblAXoPi 
#UKClimateAdapt

tweets.text: Carrying out checks across #Devon today with @EnvAgency to ensure compliance with the #ScrapMetal Dealers Act & disrupt the trade in #stolen #metal from #HeritageSites, #Farms & #Infrastructure. If you're offered #Cash4Scrap this is illegal & should be reported to @EnvAgency. https://t.co/bH7ywe7od2

Mike Best from @EnvAgency talks about use of #Sentinel3 from a regulator's perspective! A web based alert system for #algalblooms using the latest #Copernicus datasets would be extremely valuable! @CopernicusEU #JNCC_EO4water https://t.co/0SryS1t35f

Officers from @MPSThamesmeadM & @EnvAgency have recently patrolled together local lakes & the Thames riverbank to detect illegal fishing/poaching &any other crimes linked to these offences.The Wildlife Crime Unit is facilitating these patrols as part of #OpTraverse @AnglingTrust https://t.co/J5UpeUy97M

New research by @AquaUoS and @SalfordGEM student Alex Quinn  shows River Keekle could be the most polluted river in England

@EnvAgencyNW @SalfordHydro @SalfordScience @SalfordResearch @AquaUoS

https://t.co/vVc0tGtAk9 https://t.co/OoDaKmYd8j

Our second set of marine applications at #JNCC_EO4water gives examples of monitoring sediment disturbance, the Ocean Colour-CCI and detecting #eutrophication and harmful algal blooms from space @CefasGovUK @EnvAgency @PlymouthMarine @CopernicusEU https://t.co/zII2weDbjZ https://t.co/B9J5PvsOvd

BTP officers joined forces with @warkspolice @networkrail @EnvAgency @WeAreOpenreach @wpduk (Western Power) to visit scrap dealers in Coventry and Warwickshire yesterday. Enquiries into 12 tonnes of power cable and some rail signal cable are ongoing. Got info? Text us on 61016. https://t.co/Q0sgou2rsy

Do you have a permit to break vehicles? If not we have new powers to shut you down. Why risk it? Call us for free advice on how to make your business legal: 03708 506 506. #WasteCrime  #CleanDevon https://t.co/BVvGej6ZVS

93% of sewer blockages are caused by wet wipes being flushed down the loo! Like here in #Stroud cleared by @stwater 

Protect your pipes & the #environment - put wipes, cotton buds & sanitary products as well as fats, oils & grease in the bin #Unblocktober https://t.co/b0aBRg0gtT https://t.co/8hiL1yta2R
@MhehedZherting @EnvAgency No.

tweets.text:
@JamesAbbott2013 @EnvAgency "Have lost faith in @EnvAgency in it granting a permit for a monster #waste #incinerator with up to 600,000 tonnes of CO2 per annum emitted ...."

Spot the error / exaggeration?

Callum was flooded out of his home with mum and dad. This is his story, shown using innovative 360 video. A collaboration between @EEIatHull @CUIDARProject and @EnvAgency

https://t.co/tDUQUnzFrG

#ListenToCallum #Floods #FloodResilience https://t.co/oY2VV1T4Fi

Have lost faith in @EnvAgency in it granting a permit for a monster #waste #incinerator with up to 600,000 tonnes of CO2 per annum emitted and lower air quality for residents, operating 24/7 here in mid #Essex - flies in face of need to urgent curb greenhouse gas emissions. https://t.co/hkN9XamoWj

@PersianaJune @CllrMaryM @EnvAgencyNW @NorthendenForum @love_northenden Good afternoon Esther,

Could you please confirm the exact location of this, and we will log with our team to investigate and resolve this issue?

Today Fisheries Officers are disinfecting all of the equipment used on yesterday‚Äôs netting job at Three Sisters Recreation Area lake. 

This biosecurity procedure of ‚Äòcheck clean dry‚Äô illustrates the measures we take to reduce the risk of spreading diseases. 

#fish #Lancashire https://t.co/jZ7uJhUHNy

Weather or people? If people: planned improvement, or the opposite? 

@CllrMaryM @EnvAgencyNW @NorthendenForum @love_northenden @ManCityCouncil https://t.co/Qn9lco7bk8

Good to see that #Rickerby now has its new flood defences in place. They are watertight and we are just finishing facing, landscaping etc... These protect to a #StormDesmond level and will make a real difference to this community https://t.co/3yIQxy0OgJ

tweets.text:
Kitchen roll is one of the top 3 #unflushables people admit to having flushed down the loo. 
 
However, unlike toilet paper it doesn't dissolve and instead causes blockages. 
 
Never flush kitchen roll. 
 
Protect your pipes and our environment.

#Unblocktober #BinIt4Beaches https://t.co/jDhrwcuFFI

The Property Flood Resilience Emag sponsored by @EnvAgency & @floodre has been updated with more case studies where people have installed property flood resilience in their homes, reporting on how installations performed in recent floods. https://t.co/Tvl6R1sjC0

The team from @WoodlandTrust @CommForestTrust @EnvAgencyNW presented about the living log jams #NaturalFloodManagement trials on Smithills Estate at the #GMGreenSummit2020 recently

If you missed it, not a problem! 

You can watch it here ‚¨áÔ∏è

https://t.co/9xXKAChROW via @YouTube
